name: Samantha T
text: I brought my Golden Retriever, Max, to Brush & Bark last weekend, and I couldn't be happier! The staff was incredibly patient and gentle with him. He came out looking (and smelling!) better than ever. Highly recommend!

name: Michael D
text: Five stars for Brush & Bark! Their attention to detail is impeccable. My poodle, Coco, had her nails done perfectly. The salon is clean, and the staff is super friendly.

name: Jessica L
text: I've been taking Bella, my Cocker Spaniel, to Brush & Bark for the past year. They always do a fantastic job, and Bella is always excited to see them. The best grooming salon in town!

name: Terry G
text: Great experience at Brush & Bark! They were very accommodating with my schedule and did an excellent job grooming my two Labradors. Professional, courteous, and very skilled!

name: Karen W
text: Thank you, Brush & Bark, for taking such good care of Sammy during his grooming session. He looks adorable with his new haircut. We'll definitely be back!

name: Ethan R
text: Absolutely thrilled with the service at Brush & Bark! They managed to perfectly groom my nervous Shih Tzu, who usually hates being groomed. Very impressive!

name: Olivia P
text: I love Brush & Bark! They always go above and beyond for my German Shepherd, Duke. The staff is knowledgeable and truly cares about the dogs.

name: Robert K
text: Top-notch grooming at Brush & Bark! The groomers are true professionals who know how to handle my energetic Border Collie. She came home looking and feeling great!

name: Nina S
text: The best grooming place we've ever tried! Our Dachshund, Oscar, had his teeth cleaned, and he's never looked better. Brush & Bark does a thorough job and treats their furry clients with love.

name: Alex F
text: Brush & Bark is fantastic! They are not only great with my Husky, Niko, but also incredibly informative. They gave me some great tips on maintaining his coat between visits.
